title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Self-Care Education Program After Breast Cancer Surgery

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can describe five or more physical changes that may occur after breast cancer surgery.
Learners can practice post-operative wound management methods (wound care, lymphedema prevention, etc.) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish and implement personalized self-management plans using a smartphone app.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
